senses.sense_definition: A person whose job is to <w>inoculate</w> people or animals against disease.

examples.text: The <w>inoculator</w> prepared the vaccine before calling the next patient in.
She worked as a trained <w>inoculator</w> during the public health campaign.

senses.sense_definition: A device or instrument used to <w>inoculate</w>.

examples.text: The scientist sterilized the <w>inoculator</w> over a flame before touching the bacteria.
Farmers use a mechanical <w>inoculator</w> to treat seeds with beneficial microbes.
